summary: An unassuming pet photographer is thrown into serious action, adventure and romance when he's forced to marry a Croatian bride and spend his honeymoon at a remote tropical resort where she is kidnapped.
cast: Dave Annable|Katharine McPhee|Rob Schneider|Mena Suvari|Kathy Bates|Ken Davitian|Tia Carrere|Kevin Dunn|Vinnie Jones|Stephen Tobolowsky|Howard Bishop|Jeanne Rogers|Willie K. Kahaiali'i|Theo Coumbis|Dorian Burns|Tani Lynn Fujimoto|Al Harrington|Allan Okubo|Michelle Cornish|Paul Edney|Joe Fick|Celia Kenney|Duke Kenney|Paul Leo Klink|Stephen Meyers|Bill Ogilvie|Jordan Segundo|E.J. Snyder|Hudson Taylor|Jordan Kirkwood|Alan Seabock
title: You May Not Kiss the Bride
